briefTitle: Correlation Between MRS (Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy) and Tumor Response to Radiation Therapy in Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Correlation Between MRS (Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy) and Tumor Response to Radiation Therapy in Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Histologically confirmed diagnosed Breast cancer
* Patient is 18 years or older
* Karnofsky performance score \> 70
* No previously irradiated or recurrent breast cancer
* No contraindication to MRS/MRI
* Signed informed consent.
